name: search_filters
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jsearch.
Tool description: Fast and Simple searches for jobs posted on LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter, Dice and others, all in a single API.
API description: Accepts all **Search** endpoint parameters (except for `page` and `num_pages`) and returns the relevant filters and their estimated result counts for later use in search or for analytics.

query.description:
Free-form jobs search query. It is highly recommended to include job title and location as part of the query, see query examples below.

**Query examples**
- *web development in chicago*
- *marketing manager in new york via linkedin*
- *developer in germany 60306*

language.description:
[EXPERIMENTAL]

Set the language of the results. In case set, Google for Jobs might prefer jobs that were posted in the specified language.

Allowed values: 2-letter language code, see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes)
Default: `en`.

country.description:
[EXPERIMENTAL]

The country / region from which to make the query.

Allowed values: 2-letter country code, see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)
Default: `us`.

categories.description:
**[Deprecated]** Categories/industries filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `categories` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *categories=R0MxODpNYW5hZ2VtZW50,R0MwNTpBcnRGYXNoaW9uRGVzaWdu*

company_types.description:
Company types filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `company_types` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *company_types= L2J1c2luZXNzL25haWNzMjAwNy81MjpGaW5hbmNl,L2J1c2luZXNzL25haWNzMjAwNy81MTpJbmZvcm1hdGlvbg==*

job_titles.description:
Job title filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `job_titles` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *job_titles=c2VuaW9y,YXNzb2NpYXRl*

job_requirements.description: Find jobs with specific requirements, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `under_3_years_experience`, `more_than_3_years_experience`, `no_experience`, `no_degree`.

radius.description: Distance (in km) within which to return jobs, measured from the location specified in the query.

employers.description:
Employers filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `employers` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *employers= L2cvMTFoMTV4eHhydDpJbmZpbml0eSBDb25zdWx0aW5n,L2cvMTFmMDEzOXIxbjpDeWJlckNvZGVycw==*

remote_jobs_only.description:
Find remote jobs only (work from home).
Default: `false`.

employment_types.description: Find jobs of particular employment types, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `FULLTIME`, `CONTRACTOR`, `PARTTIME`, `INTERN`.

date_posted.description:
Find jobs posted within the time you specify.
Possible values: `all`, `today`, `3days`, `week`,`month`.
Default: `all`.
